text:
[Verse]
Sun is gone it's grey
Sky feels far away
Feet start to sway
Dancing all day

[Verse 2]
Puddles on the ground
Joy in every round
Echoes of the sound
In my heart they pound

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
No need to explain
Laughter through the pain
We’ll be back again

[Verse 3]
Drops on my face
Nothing can erase
The smiles that we chase
In this sacred space

[Verse 4]
Thunder plays its tune
Underneath the moon
Midnight ain't too soon
Groove until it's noon

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
No need to explain
Laughter through the pain
We’ll be back again
title: Dancing in the Rain
